00019 template <class _ObjectType>
00020 struct MatchKindOf : public SensorMatchFunction
00021 {
00022     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* obj)
00023     {
00024         return dynamic_cast<_ObjectType*>(obj) != NULL;
00025     }
00026 };

00032 template <class _ObjectType>
00033 struct MatchExact : public SensorMatchFunction
00034 {
00035     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* obj)
00036     {
00037         return typeid(*obj) == typeid(_ObjectType);
00038     }
00039 };

00044 struct MatchSpecific : public SensorMatchFunction
00045 {
00046     MatchSpecific(WorldObject* obj):target(obj){}
00047 
00048     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* obj)
00049     {
00050         return obj == target;
00051     }
00052 
00053     WorldObject* target;
00054 };

00063 struct MatchComposeOr : public SensorMatchFunction, public std::vector<SensorMatchFunction*>
00064 {
00065     MatchComposeOr(){}
00066     MatchComposeOr(SensorMatchFunction* first, SensorMatchFunction* second)
00067     {
00068         push_back(first);
00069         push_back(second);
00070     }
00071 
00072     virtual ~MatchComposeOr()
00073     {
00074         for (iterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) {
00075             delete *i;
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* obj)
00080     {
00081         for (iterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) {
00082             if ((**i)(obj)) return true;
00083         }
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00096 struct MatchComposeAnd : public SensorMatchFunction, public std::vector<SensorMatchFunction*>
00097 {
00098     MatchComposeAnd(){}
00099     MatchComposeAnd(SensorMatchFunction* first, SensorMatchFunction* second)
00100     {
00101         push_back(first);
00102         push_back(second);
00103     }
00104 
00105     virtual ~MatchComposeAnd()
00106     {
00107         for (iterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) {
00108             delete *i;
00109         }
00110     }
00111 
00112     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* obj)
00113     {
00114         for (iterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) {
00115             if (!(**i)(obj)) return false;
00116         }
00117         return true;
00118     }
00119 };

00127 template <class _Functor>
00128 struct MatchAdapter : SensorMatchFunction
00129 {
00130     MatchAdapter(_Functor f):functor(f){}
00131 
00132     virtual bool operator()(WorldObject* input)
00133     {
00134         return functor(input);
00135     }
00136 
00137     _Functor functor;
00138 };
00139 
00143 template <class _Functor>
00144 MatchAdapter<_Functor>* MatchAdapt(_Functor f)
00145 {
00146     return new MatchAdapter<_Functor>(f);
00147 }

00155 class EvalNearest : public SensorEvalFunction
00156 {
00157 public:
00158     EvalNearest(WorldObject* o, double range):owner(o), range(range),
00159         nearestSoFar(range), bestCandidate(NULL){}
00160     virtual ~EvalNearest(){}
00161 
00162     virtual void Reset()
00163     {
00164         bestCandidate = NULL;
00165         nearestSoFar = range;
00166     }
00167         
00168     virtual void operator()(WorldObject* obj, const Vector2D& loc)
00169     {   
00170         distance = (owner->GetLocation() - loc).GetLength();
00171         if (distance < nearestSoFar) {
00172             nearestSoFar = distance;
00173             bestCandidate = obj;
00174             bestCandidateVec = loc;
00175         }
00176     }
00177     
00178     virtual double GetOutput()const
00179     {   
00180         return nearestSoFar;
00181     }
00182 
00183     WorldObject* owner;
00184 
00185     double range;
00186     double nearestSoFar;
00187     WorldObject* bestCandidate;
00188     Vector2D bestCandidateVec;
00189 
00190 private:
00191     double distance;
00192 };
00193 
00198 class EvalNearestXDist : public EvalNearest
00199 {
00200 public:
00201     EvalNearestXDist(WorldObject* o, double range):EvalNearest(o, range){}
00202     virtual ~EvalNearestXDist(){}
00203 
00204     virtual double GetOutput()const
00205     {
00206         return bestCandidateVec.x - owner->GetLocation().x;
00207     }
00208 };

00261 class EvalNearestAngle : public EvalNearest
00262 {
00263 public:
00264     EvalNearestAngle(WorldObject* o, double range):EvalNearest(o, range){}
00265     virtual ~EvalNearestAngle(){}
00266 
00267     virtual double GetOutput()const
00268     {
00269         return bound(-PI, PI, (bestCandidateVec - owner->GetLocation()).GetAngle() - owner->GetOrientation());
00270     }
00271 };

00273 /*
00274  * Keeps a total of every time it's called per round. Starting count may
00275  * be defined but defaults to 0.
00276  */
00277 class EvalCount : public SensorEvalFunction
00278 {
00279 public:
00280     EvalCount(int start = 0):startingCount(start), numberSoFar(0){}
00281     virtual ~EvalCount(){}
00282 
00283     virtual void Reset()
00284     {   numberSoFar = 0;
00285     }
00286 
00287     virtual void operator()(WorldObject*, const Vector2D& loc)
00288     {   ++numberSoFar;
00289     }
00290 
00291     virtual double GetOutput()const
00292     {   return static_cast<double>(numberSoFar + startingCount); }
00293 
00294 private:        
00295     const int startingCount;
00296     int numberSoFar;
00297 };

00310 struct ScaleCompose : public SensorScaleFunction
00311 {
00312     ScaleCompose(SensorScaleFunction* f, SensorScaleFunction* s):first(f), second(s){}
00313 
00314     virtual ~ScaleCompose()
00315     {
00316         delete first;
00317         delete second;
00318     }
00319 
00320     virtual double operator()(double input)
00321     {
00322         return (*second)((*first)(input));
00323     }
00324 
00325 private:
00326     SensorScaleFunction *first, *second;
00327 };
00328 
00335 struct ScaleLinear : public SensorScaleFunction
00336 {
00337     ScaleLinear(double range):inMin(0.0), inMax(range), outMin(0.0), outMax(1.0){}
00338     ScaleLinear(double inputMinimum, double inputMaximum, 
00339                  double outputMinimum, double outputMaximum):
00340       inMin(inputMinimum), inMax(inputMaximum), 
00341       outMin(outputMinimum), outMax(outputMaximum){}
00342 
00343     virtual double operator()(double input)
00344     {   
00345         return (input - inMin) / (inMax - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) + outMin;
00346     }
00347 
00348     double inMin, inMax, outMin, outMax;
00349 };
00350 
00354 struct ScaleAbs : public SensorScaleFunction
00355 {
00356     virtual double operator()(double input)
00357     {
00358         return input >= 0.0 ? input : -input;
00359     }
00360 };
00361 
00367 struct ScaleThreshold : SensorScaleFunction
00368 {
00369     ScaleThreshold(double t, double a = 0.0, double b = 1.0):threshold(t), minimum(a), maximum(b){}
00370 
00371     virtual double operator()(double input)
00372     {   
00373         return input < threshold ? minimum : maximum;
00374     }
00375 
00376     double threshold, minimum, maximum;
00377 };
00378 
00383 struct ScaleNoise : SensorScaleFunction
00384 {
00385     ScaleNoise(double min = -0.1, double max = 0.1):minimum(min), maximum(max){}
00386 
00387     virtual double operator()(double input)
00388     {
00389         return input + randval(maximum - minimum) + minimum;
00390     }
00391 
00392     double minimum, maximum;
00393 };
00394 
00401 template <class _Functor>
00402 struct ScaleAdapter : SensorScaleFunction
00403 {
00404     explicit ScaleAdapter(_Functor f):functor(f){}
00405 
00406     virtual double operator()(double input)
00407     {
00408         return functor(input);
00409     }
00410 
00411     _Functor functor;
00412 };
00413 
00418 template <class _Functor>
00419 ScaleAdapter<_Functor>* ScaleAdapt(_Functor f)
00420 {
00421     return new ScaleAdapter<_Functor>(f);
00422 }
